title: Can't Upgrade skin shard into permanent skin
body: Hi, i just have issue with upgrading skin shard into permanent skin. I have looked at other questions on the board, but it is not really my case. I have enough orange essence, i own the champion. So when I pressed the button 'upgrade to skin permanent', literally nothing happens. It just pops off stays. Can you fix this problem plz ?

replies.body:
Hi Erudon, Could you please try again? There may have been an issue with the store retrieving your Orange Essence balance details but it may be resolved now.
(Saforya in this thread was since able to craft a skin with OE)
I'm having the same exact issue, I have the orange essence and the champion, but it still doesn't work.
I have a similar issue, own the champ, have enough orange essence, but the upgrade to skin permanent button is grayed out.

Hey Garm! 

Can you try restarting your client and seeing if the button shows as active again? Otherwise, I'd recommend posting a new thread with any information you feel could be relevant, including screenshots, to help us figure out what may be going on. Thanks!
I am having this exact same issue and made my own post (with almost the same title too). Restarting the client does nothing to help. This problem is very frustrating ):
same issue here have enough essence and have the champion but cant upgrade a skin. when i press "upgrade to a skin permanent " nth happens please any help
